title: S3 Ep134: The Spooky Secrets of the Stanley Hotel w/Billy Ward- Hr. 2
itunes:title: The Spooky Secrets of the Stanley Hotel w/Billy Ward- Hr. 2
description: Darkness Radio welcomes Billy Ward, Tour Guide of the world famous Stanley Hotel in Estes Park, Colorado!  Billy talks about the rich history of the Stanley, from it's humble beginnings, to it's paranormal origins, and it's inspiration to Author Stephen King to write his book, "The Shining"!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
